TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaLengthFacet extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaNumericFacet

Docs.summary: Represents the facet from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C). This class can be used to specify a restriction on the length of a element on the data type.

remarks.format:
